heading: A Big Community
content: Our Reddit and Discord communities are a network of people sharing knowledge, solving problems, and helping each other grow bringing together learners, professionals, and developers.

heading: Updated Resources
content: We track changes to Microsoft’s certification ecosystem to keep your learning current. From new exam outlines to deprecations and exam updates, everything here evolves with the platform itself

heading: Comprehensive Documentation
content: Our wiki gathers detailed guides, courses, and breakdowns of exam objectives, so you can move from understanding concepts to mastering them.

heading: Open-Source Design
content: Built for transparency, powered by collaboration. MSFTHub’s open-source foundation means anyone can contribute, refine, and improve what’s shared.
